title: Adele sported a new look at Drake's birthday party and it was fire
text:
(CNN) We see you Adele!

The singer partied with one of her favorite artists, rapper Drake, at his 33rd birthday party and people noticed her new look.

Adele was looking decidedly more svelte and wearing a black, off-the-shoulder gown, cinched with a jeweled belt -- all the better to show off her small waist, which sent Twitter into a spin.

Adele is skinny and gorgeous omg pic.twitter.com/vkwwDuku9y — yael (@Yaael_Bowie) October 24, 2019

adele is so unreal oh my god pic.twitter.com/pVZqxq9SFY — chesca (@ADELEGASM) October 24, 2019

"Adele is skinny and gorgeous omg," one person tweeted.
description: The singer partied with one of her favorite artists, rapper Drake, at his 33rd birthday party and people noticed her new look.
